import React, { useState, useContext } from 'react'; import UserContext from './userContext'; import { Container, Button, Form, FormGroup, Label, Input, Col } from 'reactstrap'; const EditProfileForm = () => { const { user } = useContext(UserContext); const initialState = { password: '', 'first-name': '', 'last-name': '', email: '' }; const [formData, setFormData] = useState(initialState); const handleChange = e => { setFormData(fData => ({ ...fData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value })) }; return (

Profile

{user.username}
) }; export default EditProfileForm
